title: A Tale of Two Trees
itunes:title: A Tale of Two Trees
description: Today's scriptures present stories of two trees: the burning bush, that represents the reality of a soul that is receptive to God's presence, and the fig tree, which represents God's presence resisted and refused.
content:encoded: Today's scriptures present stories of two trees: the burning bush, that represents the reality of a soul that is receptive to God's presence, and the fig tree, which represents God's presence resisted and refused.

itunes:author: Bishop Robert Barron
